channel.title: [PI] Client error
channel.description: When i opened my server many people experienced problems with opening the client. I tried to remove the crash packet, which i thought was the problem. This is the error everyone seems to get [code=bat]Deception is loading.. Model cache loaded. Loaded 525 graphics... Loaded the flo. 2352 Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 75 at Class36.method531(Class36.java:114) at Model.method470(Model.java:1645) at ObjectDef.method581(ObjectDef.java:291) at ObjectDef.method578(ObjectDef.java:161) at Animable_Sub5.getRotatedModel(Animable_Sub5.java:41) at Animable.method443(Animable.java:10) at WorldController.method314(WorldController.java:1285) at WorldController.method313(WorldController.java:1021) at client.method146(client.java:14149) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:9325) at client.processDrawing(client.java:10161) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:5759) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)[/code]

item.title: [PI] Client error
item.dc:creator: @runescape_sucks runescape sucks
item.description:
@runescape_sucks wrote:

When i opened my server many people experienced problems with opening the client. I tried to remove the crash packet, which i thought was the problem.
This is the error everyone seems to get

Deception is loading.. Model cache loaded. Loaded 525 graphics... Loaded the flo. 2352 Exception in thread "Thread-4" java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 75 at Class36.method531(Class36.java:114) at Model.method470(Model.java:1645) at ObjectDef.method581(ObjectDef.java:291) at ObjectDef.method578(ObjectDef.java:161) at Animable_Sub5.getRotatedModel(Animable_Sub5.java:41) at Animable.method443(Animable.java:10) at WorldController.method314(WorldController.java:1285) at WorldController.method313(WorldController.java:1021) at client.method146(client.java:14149) at client.drawGameScreen(client.java:9325) at client.processDrawing(client.java:10161) at RSApplet.run(RSApplet.java:108) at client.run(client.java:5759) at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)

Read full topic
